name: Floatin'
description:
As a master at yoga, it's only natural that you use your powers for good. Use your various poses to blast away enemies!

This was a game made in a week for fun, I hope you enjoy it!

Music by: https://twitter.com/ddellappenta

Controls

WASD - Change Pose/Fire Direction

Left Click/Hold Left Click - Fire bullets

Move Mouse - Move around the screen
